item.description: This is a sample description, that will be visible in the devlog list.This only has single line.
item.content: This is the content that will be visible when the user clicks on any card in the devlog list. This can have multiple lines. This can also have html tags for flexibilty For exxample This is sentence is in italics This sentence is in bold or i could just do this word in bold and italics Also it supports my own custom schenaigans like for example censoring. like this : This sentence is censored You can unhide this Or you could censor a particular word for example thisword. Or Giched texts like this: abracadabra and this is heavy glitched Here only w is visible, everything else is just asterisk. This applies to each word so its not the whole sentence
